archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0863
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to ensure fraud and agency liaison team requirements and impacts are considered each time we design or evolve our products and systems by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
